sections.heading: funds authorized.The Nebraska State Historical Society may use General Fund appropriations to match other funds, grants, or money received to carry out the Nebraska Archaeological Resources Preservation Act

sections.text:
82-509.Matching funds authorized.

The Nebraska State Historical Society may use General Fund appropriations to match other funds, grants, or money received to carry out the Nebraska Archaeological Resources Preservation Act.

SourceLaws 2005, LB 211, ยง 9.
